name: Gate Keeper: The Game
description:
Action game - Gate keeper. Get your bow and arrow ready!

A simple hero protects the gate from attacking dark forces.

You have to protect the troops and fortresses of your homeland from the invasion of enemy troops.

Gatekeeper: Game Features:
- an altered level of history, changing in the process of passing
- on some maps, part of the battlefield is interactive and dynamically changes during battles
- changes to the campaign map depending on the progress of the game
- several types of arrows
- chests with various bonuses
- various monsters in mechanics

The gate keeper prevents monsters from breaking through, protecting city dwellers and protecting traumatically important strongholds. You can tactically use the abilities of some enemies against themselves.

We hope you are interested.

We wish you a good game!
